summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3212 for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-fifth Street to Ravenna Boulevard, and certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39677 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
